title: Manage Warehouse Equipment Maintenance
description: A forklift in the warehouse is due for its scheduled preventive maintenance.

tasks.description: Receive an automated alert that a piece of equipment is due for maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the alert for the specific forklift.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created in the maintenance system.

tasks.description: Schedule the maintenance with the on-site technician or an external vendor.
